email_subject: Follow-up from KGC23 and More Exciting News!
email_body:
Hi Jane,

It was a pleasure meeting you at KGC23. I know it's been a while but I wanted to follow up on a few things that you might find interesting.

I've had the chance to work closely with Gale Robinson, who I believe you report to in SafeSecurity. He's written some extraordinary papers on Cyber Security and has been accepted to speak at SIGAPP. I believe he would appreciate your insights on the subject. Do check this out.

Also, our mutual colleague, Moses Sharp, has been performing brilliantly in recent projects. I'm sure his work would interest you. You can find more details in the same link above.

Looking forward to your thoughts.

Best,
Jacob Williams
